title: E-Commerce
description: Aranoz Furniture E-commerce is a dynamic platform for furniture enthusiasts, developed using Django, HTML, CSS, and Ajax. It features rich functionality with distinct administrator and user interfaces. The site offers a seamless shopping experience tailored to furniture.

title: Profcio Services
description: Proficio.molla.cloud connects users with professionals, using a Django backend with Redis, Celery, and Channels, and a React frontend with Material UI. Hosted on AWS and Vercel, it features booking, Stripe payments, absentee marking, and reviews.

title: Netflix Clone
description: I developed a professional Netflix clone utilizing the TMDB API for real-time movie and TV show data. This project is entirely front-end, showcasing seamless integration without the need for a backend.

title: Fast API CRUD
description: Implemented a FastAPI CRUD application using SQLite as the database and Uvicorn as the ASGI server. The project provides efficient and rapid CRUD operations with a lightweight, high-performance setup. This solution ensures robust data handling and swift API responses.

title: GraphQL CRUD
description: Developed a GraphQL CRUD application using Django and SQLite for the database. This project delivers efficient data operations with a flexible and intuitive query system. The integration ensures seamless data management and rapid API interactions.

title: Node JS + PostgresSQL
description: Implemented a basic CRUD operation using Node.js and Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL. This project provides robust data handling and seamless database interactions. The setup ensures efficient and reliable CRUD functionalities.
